ch.obermuhlner.jhuge.converter

Class SerializableConverter<T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.obermuhlner.jhuge.converter.SerializableConverter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the object to convert
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Converter<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompactConverter

    public class SerializableConverter<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Converter<T>
    Uses Java serialization to convert an object into a serialized representation and back.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SerializableConverter(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Constructs a converter that uses the specified ClassLoader to deserialize the object.

        public SerializableConverter(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Constructs a converter that uses the specified ClassLoader to deserialize the object.

    • Method Detail

      • serializedLength

        public int serializedLength()
        Description copied from interface: Converter
        Returns the length of the serialized form (if known).
        Specified by:
        serializedLength in interface Converter<T extends java.io.Serializable>
        Returns:
        the length of the serialized form in bytes if it is always the same, or negative if it varies with the data in the object or cannot be determined in advance.

        Deserializes an InputStream using the specified ClassLoader.
